Uses of Plan in org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan
 

Classes in org.cougaar.planning.ldm.plan that implement Plan
 class PlanImpl
          A Plan is an abstract data structure which consists of a set of PlanElements (which are associations between Tasks and Allocations).
